Wilson's API

This is a simple API that can GET, POST, PATCH and DELETE:

Method URL Description
GET localhost:3000/ This returns our beautiful help page.
GET localhost:3000/Users This returns all of the users that have been posted. Note, the data is not persisted.
POST localhost:3000/User This post's a user. Each user must have a UserID, and an optional FirstName, LastName, EmailAddress, and Password. Note the password is not in any way secure, so you probably shouldn't use it.
GET localhost:3000/User/{ID} This returns user by ID, returns 404 if user is not found.
PATCH localhost:3000/User/{ID} This updates a user's data by ID. Returns 404 if not found. Note, the id cannot be changed.
DELETE localhost:3000/User/{ID} This deletes a user if they exist and will return 404 if the user does not exist.
